body_html:
Are you sure you are passing a Variable instance to embed? This works for me:

In [11]: a = Variable(torch.LongTensor([[1, 0, 2], [2, 1, 0], [0, 0, 1]]))

In [12]: emb = nn.EmbeddingBag(3,4)

In [13]: emb(a)
Out[13]:
Variable containing:
-0.7979  0.9842  0.4947 -0.8800
-0.7979  0.9842  0.4947 -0.8800
 0.0435  0.7139 -0.1079 -0.8040
[torch.FloatTensor of size 3x4]

body:
Are you sure you are passing a `Variable` instance to `embed`? This works for me:

```
In [11]: a = Variable(torch.LongTensor([[1, 0, 2], [2, 1, 0], [0, 0, 1]]))

In [12]: emb = nn.EmbeddingBag(3,4)

In [13]: emb(a)
Out[13]:
Variable containing:
-0.7979  0.9842  0.4947 -0.8800
-0.7979  0.9842  0.4947 -0.8800
 0.0435  0.7139 -0.1079 -0.8040
[torch.FloatTensor of size 3x4]
```
